param.name: mapx
param.label: Pixel x coordinate for map icon using catmap plugin.
param.description: Enter the number of pixels from the left of the map image you have used as a parameter in your catmap plugin.

param.name: mapy
param.label: Pixel y coordinate for map icon using catmap plugin.
param.description: Enter the number of pixels from the top of the map image you have used as a parameter in your catmap plugin.

param.name: mapclass
param.label: CSS class to apply to map bullets and icons.
param.description: Use e.g. '#map a.catmapicon' selector to control background image displayed for icon on the map.
